text: Good value for money. Excellent service by NGP STORE when I accidentally received only a 16GB version. Since I had left the country by the time I found out, they apologized and did not hesitate to refund me an appropriate amount for which I will put in a bigger SD card.

title: Great product for the price!
text: Great product, good feel and grip, very good image quality, acceptable sound and probably one of the best products for the money. I have been looking for something like this and I would like to say that I am very pleased with my purchase. I am recommending this without a doubt, but be careful when you buy a protective case, because some of the adds do not correspond to reality!

title: Nice phone....crap battery

title: Great features but freezes at times.
text: The phone looks as advertised and come with a charger (110V), a key to open the slots and headphones.HOWEVER, within a few days of using it, the screen has started freezing when tapping on it. It started with the camera app while taking phones. You keep touching the screen but the phone does not respond. Sometimes it takes more than a minute and I have to close the camera and reopen it. It has now started happening in other apps. I find this very strange since I have had the phone about 2 weeks now if so much...It uses the micro sim cards and has two slots and a space for adding more storage space. The photo quality is very good, both front and back and it has a built in flashlight app. A+ for me. One less app to download.Feel free to ask me any questions... I'm considering returning it for a replacement however.

title: Lovely phone!

title: After several months of looking for Galaxy Smart Phones, I am glad it end up with ...
text: After several months of  looking for Galaxy Smart Phones, I am glad it end up with this one. It works perfectly as expected and paid about half the price of Galaxy S7..I dont use it as a phone that much but use for playing Crash of Clan all the time. Other functions that I like most is to do banking online by deposit checks without making a trip to the bank ( PNC Bank). It works like a tablet, with 5.5" screen, so we can check the weather report, read the news, listens to music, vidio from utube, etc. Highly recommended.

title: Amazing phone for the price !
text: So far im in love with this phone ! I love the quality of the phone and the sleek metal body. I love the fact that the speaker is on the side of the phone and its loud! The only complaint is that this version of the j7 doesn't have the selfie flash option like the 2016 j7 has. Other then that it's amazing ! And regardless of the selfie flash the camera is amazing front and back:) highly recommend this phone if you'd like something updated but won't break the bank!!!

title: Love it! Hassle free
text: Love it! Hassle free, product arrived as advertised, meaning brand new and factory sealed! Great experience! Mostly when my previous experience with cell phone purchases from other sellers cost me so much energy, headaches and frustration. This is how it should be done always when you are selling something!
